Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.graphics used by com.badlogic.gdx
Font

           A Mesh, either indexed or non-indexed.
Pixmap
          A Pixmap represents a plattform specific bitmap.
Pixmap.Format
          Different pixel formats.
RenderListener
          A RenderListener can be hooked to a Application and will receive setup, render and dispose events.
Texture
          A Texture represents a bitmap to be applied to a Mesh.
